select * from (select * from product order by read_count desc) where rownum <= ${endrow}
select * from (select * from product order by write_date desc) where rownum <= ${endrow}

mapper.insert: insert into product (goods_num, goods_name, price, image, category, energy_efcnc, liter, read_count, write_date) values(#{goods_num}, #{goods_name}, #{price}, #{image}, #{category}, #{energy_efcnc}, #{liter}, 0, sysdate)
